channel.title: Java Problem [I Need Help] [Compiling]
channel.description:
Okay i Download Jdk 6 update 7 and i also added the Class Path and Path, on user varibles, but for somereason, everytime i use compile it says [b]This System Could Not Find The Specified Pat[/b]h, or [b]"Java" is not reconginze as an external command.[/b] This is what i put for ClassPath [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] This is what i put for The Path [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin[/code] Any Help Here please, if it is my java can you give me another direct link to another jdk download, and the class path and path please.. thanks
! X Bliitz X !

item.title: Java Problem [I Need Help] [Compiling]
item.dc:creator: @X_Bliitz_X X Bliitz X
item.description:
@X_Bliitz_X wrote:

Okay i Download Jdk 6 update 7 and i also added the Class Path and Path, on user varibles, but for somereason, everytime i use compile it says
This System Could Not Find The Specified Path, or
“Java” is not reconginze as an external command.
This is what i put for ClassPath

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

This is what i put for The Path

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin

Any Help Here please, if it is my java can you give me another direct link to another jdk download, and the class path and path please… thanks

! X Bliitz X !
